delete.title: Confirm Account Deletion
delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete account "{{email}}"? This action cannot be undone.

clearAll.title: Confirm Clear All Backups
clearAll.message: This operation will permanently delete all {{count}} accounts and cannot be recovered. Are you sure you want to continue?
clearAll.noBackups: No user backups available to clear

loginNew.title: Login New Account
loginNew.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to close Antigravity and login with a new account?
loginNew.warning: Note: The system will automatically start Antigravity, please save all important work
